description:
From icy dawn patrols, to resort days, these goggles help you stay focused. Designed for smaller faces, the Moment doesn’t lose any of the features found Smith’s larger goggles. High-contrast ChromaPop® lenses, 3-layer foam and anti-fog finish prove smaller doesn’t mean less.

  • ChromaPop lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions
  • Spherical Carbonic-X lens has crisp TLT optics
  • Fog-X anti-fog lens helps keep your vision clear
  • Responsive Fit design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight
  • 3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system and a clip buckle
  • Includes a microfiber goggle bag
  • Designed for smaller faces
name: Smith Moment Goggles - Unisex
